content: skill level beginner level 1 homespun® article #790 2 colors 8 balls total mc 5 balls cc 3 balls crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm gauge 10 single_crochet = 4 inches 10 cm each square measures 8 inches x 8 inches work 35 two-color squares in single_crochet u s sew together as shown in assembly diagram crochet border to finish crochet terms are in u s terminology available in different colorways autumn afternoon afghan 1 2002 *chs-autumnafternoonafghan pdf* *mediterranean & bella vista* 70199a crochet afghan 2 2005 *rococo & shaker* see winter night afghan 3 for the knit version similar pattern l20518 snow and sunsets afghan 4 is worked in half_double_crochet 3 colors 1 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-autumn-afternoon-afghan-1 variant=32420880351325 2 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-afghan-1 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/winter-night-afghan 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/snow-and-sunsets-afghan
